title: Open House
description: An open source CRM platform designed to manage business information and increase productivity for Real Estate professionals.
tech: React, Material UI, Node, Express, MongoDB, JWT, Chart.js

title: Pyramid
description: An employee directory that allows the user to filter and sort their employees by multiple categories in an intuitive environment.

title: Gitworkd
description: A platform that promotes collaboration by allowing users to share and explore open source applications. Users are able to upload, save, and view repositories.
tech: JavaScript, Handlebars, Bootstrap, Node, Express, MySQL

title: Pitch
description: An application that helps you navigate the world of music by displaying general information, tour dates, and YouTube videos for hundreds of musical artists.
tech: jQuery, Materialize, Third-Party APIs, Local Storage

title: Raviga
description: A fitness tracker application used to log and track workouts in order for the user to reach fitness goals. Users are able to add new exercises to existing workouts and view their statistics.

title: BurgerBase
description: A simple application used to log your favorite burgers. Submit a burger of your choice, and then eat it by clicking the devour button next to the burger!

title: ClearSky
description: An application that enables the user to retrieve the current weather and 5-day forecast for cities across the United States.
tech: jQuery, Bootstrap, OpenWeatherMap API, Local Storage

title: Alliance
description: A Node Command Line application that enables the user to view, add, and revise employee data within a company hierarchy.
